name: Tamar Ventures
overview: Tamar Ventures, a venture capital partnership headquartered in Israel, was founded to invest primarily in Israeli technology companies in Israel. Tamar Ventures has a simple, yet innovative philosophy: Combining the collective vision and in-depth knowledge of a strong management team along with the mobility of a boutique fund. Tamar Ventures guarantees that all transactions receive the attention and guidance of a senior partner, enabling a quick reaction to opportunities and changing market conditions, focused selection and the benefits of high level attention. Their portfolio companies receive dedicated personal attention and their investors are exposed to less risk at a high return.

funding_round.source_description: Officially Announces the Closing of $30 Million in Private Financing
